title: Helping Teams Improve! EP 1

embed.description: Now we are helping Teams improve! Can they work together as a team and climb the ladders? It's kinda hard focusing on 5 people, so I'll do my best. Fitz has a channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYXmP-GOGdhpw0H4DLV23tQ Do you have a team? Lemme know and I can try and help.

body:
I could have done better on the coaching part, its something I need to work on.
But I'll get there, focusing on 5 people is hard.

replies.body:
"You should be warding as soon as your trinkets are up"

As a gold player suggesting this, i am kinda disappointed.

Wards should be timed towards the end of a jungle clear (most junglers will not gank before 3 though there is some exceptions) and if an enemy jungler is on the other side of the map, you shouldn't bother warding (something i know a lot of my bronze friends really don't understand) and should hold the ward for at least 20 extra seconds.

I do agree holding for a little bit does help, and using it on camps is great.
But most of them in this team are bronze, so just constant warding and vision to stop ganks will already help them out a lot.
New series is good as always! But as a support main, more focus warding strategies/placement would have been awesome :D

Yeah I agree, focusing on 5 people is hard.
And since bot lane wasn't doing so good, I should have focused on them way more.
